channel.title: *Updated* Wingoball Script

item.title: *Updated* Wingoball Script
item.dc:creator: @tissuess tissuess
item.description:
@tissuess wrote:

this does not shoot the ball randomly. if you have problems with it, you most likely need to increase the wait times. ever a leecher can do that. the script varies because computers are all different. just do like the script says ‘run in IE, lowest settings, no sound’ and then use your own personal judgement and moify the wait times as you see fit.
Great script, i got 1050.

Read full topic

item.title: *Updated* Wingoball Script
item.description:
@75400379 wrote:

[quote=“haloshadow, post:10, topic:66631”]Compleately bad.
You can’t just exepect everyones game runs at the EXACT same speed.
Some peoples might be a few MilliSeconds faster or slower than yours. You’re asuming this isn’t so. Meaning half the people can’t use this effectively.[/quote]

Meaning you set it up yourself… Not that hard.

item.title: *Updated* Wingoball Script
item.description:
@75400379 wrote:

The lvl 18 shot goes in a slight upward slant starting from the exact center, so use your imagination to see when the hole in the gnome line gets toward the center or slightly above it, then hit up.

Read full topic

item.title: *Updated* Wingoball Script
item.description:
@75400379 wrote:

As you can see, this script plays Wingoball for you. Sorry, it is not Firefox compatible (if you use firefox to play wingoball, your score gets so much lower than if you use IE 6)

[code]//–__ WINGOBALL PLAYER __–
//http://www.neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=771

// Smallest Size: 512 x 384
// Lowest Quality
// TURN SOUND OFF
// Most points so far: 1068 (not the best possible)
// This works 90% for me using Internet Explorer 6.0
// **Because of lag, may not work for everyone (modify it)
// If it doesn’t work, try it a few times more
// Won’t work with Mozilla Firefox (plus Mozilla gives a bad score)

// READ BELOW FOR LVL 18 INSTRUCTIONS

program Wingoballv2;
begin
//Level 1
clickmouse(498,187,true);
clickmouse(498,187,true);
wait(2000);
//Level 2
clickmouse(132,84,true);
clickmouse(132,84,true);
clickmouse(132,84,true);
wait(2800);
//Level 3
clickmouse(246,164,true);
clickmouse(246,164,true);
clickmouse(246,164,true);
wait(2000);
//Level 4
clickmouse(435,27,true);
clickmouse(435,27,true);
wait(2500);
//Level 5
clickmouse(501,90,true);
clickmouse(501,90,true);
clickmouse(501,90,true);
wait(3000);
//Level 6
clickmouse(504,185,true);
clickmouse(504,185,true);
wait(3000);
//Level 7
clickmouse(273,293,true);
clickmouse(273,293,true);
wait(3550);
//Level 8
clickmouse(483,106,true);
clickmouse(483,106,true);
wait(2300);
//Level 9
clickmouse(328,21,true);
clickmouse(328,21,true);
wait(2725); //1800
//Level 10 **
clickmouse(299,263,true);
clickmouse(299,263,true);
wait(2000);
//Level 11
clickmouse(153,326,true);
clickmouse(153,326,true);
wait(5000);
//Level 12
clickmouse(203,48,true);
clickmouse(203,48,true);
wait(4600);
//Level 13
clickmouse(303,193,true);
clickmouse(303,193,true);
wait(2500);
//Level 14
clickmouse(226,87,true);
clickmouse(226,87,true);
wait(4000);
//Level 15
clickmouse(116,48,true);
clickmouse(116,48,true);
wait(3700);
//Level 16
clickmouse(109,36,true);
clickmouse(109,36,true);
wait(4475);
//Level 17
clickmouse(146,367,true);
clickmouse(146,367,true);
wait(2000);

//*** Because lvl 17 is so random,
//*** lvl 18 won’t start until you hit the UP ARROW
//*** Check the coords so you know where the ball goes
repeat
until (IsArrowDown(0));
//------------------------------------------------------
//------------------------------------------------------
//Level 18
clickmouse(311,138,true);
clickmouse(311,138,true);
wait(4000);
//Level 19
clickmouse(223,302,true);
clickmouse(223,302,true);
wait(3000);
//Level 20
clickmouse(230,95,true);
clickmouse(230,95,true);
end.
[/code]

[size=10pt]Neopets has changed this game and how it plays, so this may no longer work for you, as it even doesn’t work for me.[/size]

Read full topic
